nodes.title: Article 3
nodes.summary:
This partial document describes the specific tasks and operational mandate of an organization responsible for investment promotion and facilitation within a province.

The main tasks include:
* Welcoming and assisting potential investors with public administrations.
* Advising investors on investment sectors and site selection.
* Collecting, processing, and updating relevant information for investors.
* Disseminating this information through appropriate channels.
* Following up with interested investors to help realize their projects.
* Carrying out any ad hoc missions assigned by the Governor to support provincial development.

The text also introduces a section on the organization's "FUNCTIONING" or operations.
